name: Cambridge Bioinformatics Training
tagline: Landing page for Cambridge bioinformatics training
body:
#Bioinformatics Training at the University of Cambridge
A full schedule of bioinformatics training running in Cambridge as well as booking information can be found at the following link:
[Bioinformatics Event Timetable](http://training.csx.cam.ac.uk/bioinformatics/event-timetable)

### Courses managed by Cambridge Bioinformatics Training
+ [An Introduction to Solving Biological Problems with R](http://cambiotraining.github.io/r-intro/)
+ An Introduction to Solving Biological Problems with Python (upcoming)
+ An Introduction to Solving Biological Problems with Perl (upcoming)
+ An Introduction to Metabolomics (upcoming)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
